We had a lovely time for a late dinner and some wine. The food was good, i had lasagne and my husband the slouvaki. 
We loved the feeling inside which was quite romantic especially sitting by the window. 

The bread though was dry and the...More
A very cozy restaurant run by good people who prepare and serve excellent and hearty Greek meals. Try the gemista and don't miss the baklava!

Went for a dinner with my vegan daughter an early Friday evening. The restaurant very popular so packed with guests - both inside and outside - but we managed to get a table for two. Despite busy hour very friendly and attentive service. We enjoyed...More

Good classic greek food! I would recommend the Stifado and the Moussaka as these were excellent and takes you back to Greece. Unfortunately, the kitchen was unable to serve several dishes (including the popular Meze) even on a thursday and the dessert menu is very...More

We went there with a couple of friends.
The service was ok, nothing special, although we had to wait for some time, that was not a problem.
I ate spinach lasagna, they were good although I know how to do cook them cheaper and better...More
Family meal. Burger, mousaka, beef stew were tried. Burgers herby and garlicky with nice tsatziki. Mousaka good. Beef stew amazing, but maybe a touch too.much clove/cinnamon. Friendly staff.

Good food but... only one waiter was working actively, so we can wait for a long time before being served.
Good food but... I and my friend find each a hair in our plates. Unacceptable !

column7: God gresk mat og hyggelig personale

Piatti generosi e personale celere e cordiale. La mussaka era molto buona. Prezzi più che onesti. Da tornare.
